title: New Release Yapa 50% OFF
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new release!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**"Yapa"** by Vicente Lamónaca](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414195402/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/yapa/?refby=tipotype), with a release offer of 50% OFF!!!

[![Arya](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414195402im_/http:/cdn.myfonts.net/s/aw/720x360/255/0/130751.jpg "Arya")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414195402/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/yapa/?refby=tipotype)
